title: Administration
accessDenied: You are not an organization admin
setupDescription: Manage your organization settings and members
manageUsersDescription: Here you can manage your Oikion users
manageOrgMembersDescription: Manage organization members and their roles
manageModulesDescription: Configure which modules are visible in your organization
noOrganizationContext: No organization context. Please select an organization.
fullAccessDescription: Full access to organization settings and members
teamManagementDescription: Invite members, manage roles and permissions
invitationSentDescription: An invitation has been sent to {email}
invitationError: Something went wrong while sending the invitation.
userIdCopied: The user ID has been copied to your clipboard.
removeMemberDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the organization? They will lose access to all organization data.
memberRemoved: Member has been removed from the organization.
memberNotFound: Could not find member in organization.
memberPromoted: Member has been promoted to admin.
memberDemoted: Member role has been changed to member.
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
name: Name
deleteModuleWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {name} module.
moduleActivateError: Something went wrong while activating module. Please try again.
moduleDeactivateError: Something went wrong while deactivating module. Please try again.
moduleDeleteError: Something went wrong while deleting module. Please try again.
